item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a Helsinki-based multidisciplinary full stack developer. To put those words into more concrete terms: I primarily build frontends and backends for web-based software, with a slight tendency to lean towards the front side of things. I also manage servers and infrastructure, build development tooling, design user interfaces & perform content audits, and write technical & non-technical texts. Skills and experience Knowing how to take a project from start to finish (and beyond) is one of my key strengths.
